author: Staff Reporter
text:
A large gathering of Roman Catholic priests and nuns congregated at St. Joseph’s Church at Gnanaolivupuram here on Sunday evening for the ‘pallium investiture’ ceremony.

Archbishop Salvatore Pennacchio, the Apostolic Nuncio to India, invested the pallium with Most Rev. Antony Pappusamy, Archbishop of Madurai, at a Holy Eucharist service attended by a large number of public.
title: Archbishop receives pallium
